title: Bug 124067: Relative path not supported when selecting XML file
description: Bug 124067: When selecting an XML file, the relative path should be supported.
OB: When selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported.
EB: When selecting an XML file, both the relative and absolute paths should be supported.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file and ensure that the file path is relative, not absolute.
